                     throws java.io.IOException

        path - path to a filetree
        Returns:
        tru if it was a compressed file, false otherwise

      • getFileNames

        public java.lang.String[] getFileNames(java.lang.String pathToParentFolder)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Return filenames from the given relative path
        Parameters:
        pathToParentFolder - either "."/"" or "foo/bar.." (replacing ".." with the rest of the path)
        Returns:
        an array of filenames contained in the folder with path equal to path argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if path is invalid or filetree not initialized

                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an array of all implemented compression algorithms for the given file in the path
        Parameters:
        path - path of the file
        Returns:
        a string array containing valid compression types for the file in the path
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the path does not point a file

      • getValidCompressionParameters

        public java.lang.String[] getValidCompressionParameters(java.lang.String compressionType)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the valid compression arguments or presets for a given compression type
        Parameters:
        compressionType - String, either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Returns:
        a String[] with all valid options for the given compressionType
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if compressionType is not implemented

      • getDefaultCompressionParameter

                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the default compression parameter for the given compression type
        Parameters:
        compressionType - either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Returns:
        the default parameter for the type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if compressionType is not "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"

        public boolean isFileImage(java.lang.String path)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns true if the file in the path is a ppm image
        Parameters:
        path - relative path to a file
        Returns:
        true if the file in the path is a ppm image, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the path does not point a file

      • setCompressionType

        public void setCompressionType(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String Type)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the compression type for the file in the given path
        Parameters:
        path - relative path to a file
        Type - the compression type, either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the file does not exist, or the compression type does not support the file or if changing the compression of an already compressed file, or the compression type does not exist

                throws java.lang.Exception
        Compresses the entire file tree to the given file path
        Parameters:
        OutputFilePath - Path to the resulting compressed file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any of the compressions fails or invalid OutputFilePath

      • decompressTo

                  throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        OutputFolderPath - Path to the folder to save the decompressed data
        Throws:

                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a decompressed document from the compressed or not compressed filetree
        Parameters:
        Path - relative path to the file
        Returns:
        String that contains the entire document in UTF-8
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if i/o error, or the decompression fails

      • getImage

        public byte[] getImage(java.lang.String Path)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a byte array representing the image from the path
        Parameters:
        Path - relative path to a ppm image
        Returns:
        byte[] where the first 4 bytes represent width, 4 next the height and then 3 bytes per color (on byte per RGB component)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the image does not exist or is malformed

      • getImageAfterLossyCompression

        public byte[] getImageAfterLossyCompression(java.lang.String Path)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a byte array representing the image from the path after being compressed with the current algorithm and argument
        Parameters:
        Path - relative path to a ppm image
        Returns:
        byte[] where the first 4 bytes represent width, 4 next the height and then 3 bytes per color (on byte per RGB component)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the image does not exist or is malformed

      • presentationEncodeImage

        private byte[] presentationEncodeImage(PPMTranslator ppmt)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a byte array representing an image from a PPMTranslator
        Parameters:
        ppmt - Initialized PPMTranslator for reading
        Returns:
        byte[] where the first 4 bytes represent width, 4 next the height and then 3 bytes per color (on byte per RGB component)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the ppmt input source is malformed

      • toArray

        private byte[] toArray(int value)
        Encodes an integer into 4 bytes
        Parameters:
        value - any integer
        Returns:
        byte[4] containing the bytes from value from hight to low bits

      • chainCompress

        public void chainCompress(java.io.InputStream is,
                          java.io.OutputStream os,
                          java.lang.String compressionType,
                          java.lang.String arg0)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Compresses an InputStream to an OutputStream with the compression algorithm given by compressionType
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream containing valid uncompressed data
        os - OutputStream will contain the compressed data from InputStream
        compressionType - String that specifies the compression algorithm, either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        arg0 - String with an option for the compression type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the compression fails or i/o error

      • chainDecompress

        public void chainDecompress(java.io.InputStream is,
                            java.io.OutputStream os,
                            java.lang.String compressionType)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Decompresses an InputStream to an OutputStream with the compression algorithm given by compressionType
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream containing valid compressed data
        os - OutputStream will contain the decompressed data from InputStream
        compressionType - String that specifies the compression algorithm, either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the decompression fails or i/o error
